alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison County through 330 PM CDT... At 250 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyman to 8 miles northwest of Long Beach. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Saucier and Lyman. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 22 and 24, and between mile markers 26 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
